title: Thick Bubbly Futuristic Font - PLEASE HELP ID
author: iviondayjr

comments.content:
It looks like a slanted **[Blippo (Black)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114433/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Blippo%20Blk%20BT%20-%20Black&fid=1507855cec9dc866763fa565ec63c0e8&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Elite&fit=1)** by Robert Trogman [1970] available from Bitstream, URW++, Linotype, Tilde, Mecanorma & Scangraphic Digital Type  
Once upon a time was also available by URW as Hippo [1993] and Bauhaus 93 [1993]
Yes! Thank you so much for the quick response. You sir, are a font genius.
